columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event

columns.name: Application
columns.description: Application that performed the recorded action

columns.name: LogonType
columns.description: Type of logon session

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: Network protocol used

columns.name: FailureReason
columns.description: Information explaining why the recorded action failed

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: User name of the account

columns.name: AccountDomain
columns.description: Domain of the account

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: UPN of the account

columns.name: AccountSid
columns.description: Security Identifier (SID) of the account

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: AccountDisplayName
columns.description: Display name of the account user

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: FQDN of the device

columns.name: DeviceType
columns.description: Type of device

columns.name: OSPlatform
columns.description: Platform of the operating system running on the device

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP address assigned to the endpoint

columns.name: Port
columns.description: TCP port used during communication

columns.name: DestinationDeviceName
columns.description: Name of the server-side device that processed the recorded action

columns.name: DestinationIPAddress
columns.description: IP address of the device running the server application

columns.name: DestinationPort
columns.description: Destination port of related network communications

columns.name: TargetDeviceName
columns.description: FQDN of the device the action was applied to

columns.name: TargetAccountDisplayName
columns.description: Display name of the account that the action was applied to

columns.name: Location
columns.description: City/country or other geographic location associated with the event

columns.name: Isp
columns.description: Internet service provider (ISP) associated with the endpoint IP

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the event

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the entity or event
